basics.name: Michael Rogers
basics.label: Data Science & AI Professional
basics.summary: Retired Air Force veteran with 20+ years of intelligence and data analysis experience, and a master’s degree in computer science focused on AI/ML and collaborative software development. Proven leader in orchestrating cross-functional teams and developing scalable back-end architectures. Skilled in applying machine learning to enhance decision-making and innovation. Seeking a tech role to leverage expertise in AI/ML, research, and development.

work.position: Research Assistant, Scalable Analytics and Informatics Laboratory
highlights: Co-inventor of a web-based data science tool used by 5,000+ clients across 800 institutions.

Engineered back-end AI/ML architecture for a large-scale spatial workspace, improving data science capabilities by 30%. Pioneered winning network security hackathon project by integrating NLP and VR technologies.
Developed strategic plans and advised senior leaders on resource allocation for $1B+ in ISR assets.
Authored and routed over 100 military orders to optimize global ISR resource distribution.
Led teams of up to 80 analysts, transforming multi-source intelligence into actionable insights.
Revitalized stalled NLP project by labeling datasets from raw audio, reducing project timeline from years to months.

education.summary: Thesis: Developed collaborative software integrating Python AI/ML workflows with a JavaScript frontend.
courses: Courses: Machine Learning, Data Science, Statistical Inference, Deep Learning, Data Visualization
